channel.title: Need help with two i hope easy things. If you know your stuff come here
channel.description:
I am a begginner coder but im learning fast.... i still dont know how to do these two things yet and as soon as i get them right my server will be up... they are:
how to change what you get when you start (or what your wearing)
and for thieving change: *what you get from it..(cash,items,etc..) *and how much exp you get a time.
thanks

item.title: Need help with two i hope easy things. If you know your stuff come here
item.dc:creator: @G-Scape.no-ip.org G-Scape.no-ip.org
item.description:
@G-Scape.no-ip.org wrote:

Whenever I try to give my player a unique look and I compile it gives me that 1 error thing… anyone know whats going on?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with two i hope easy things. If you know your stuff come here

item.title: Need help with two i hope easy things. If you know your stuff come here
item.dc:creator: @Holy_Str Holy Str
item.description:
@Holy_Str wrote:

Ok…What Ur Gonna Wanna Do Is Go To Your ““Client.java”” Right Click And Click Edit, Then Once Inside Hit “Ctrl F” And Type In The Search Box This;

case 2562:
TheifStall(“gem stall”, “and recieve 50k”, 60, 125*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 30, 0x340);
break;

Thats For Theiving U’ll Be Able To Figure Out Wut U Need From There. Hopefully, If Not, See 995, 50000, 30 0x340?
If Im Correct, And Being A Beginner Coder Myself, U Change The 50000 Part To However Much Then Edit The Part Of Recieve 50k To However Corrected Amount U Add.

For Starting Gear U Go To Right Click And Edit On ""Player.java Once Again Hit “Ctrl F” Go In The Search Box And Type;

//Giving the player an unique look

And It Will Come Up With Equipment Ideals, U Put The Id Of The Starting Item U Want In The Spot.
Example.

playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerCape]=6570;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842;
playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

Which Is My Starting Gear, Firecape, Fury, Whip, Holy Book, Leech If U Want Idc

Enjoy M8 =]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with two i hope easy things. If you know your stuff come here
